House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03639
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT (DHUD), DEFINING THE MANDATES, POWERS, AND FUNCTIONS, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Department Of Housing And Urban Development Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Creates a Department of Housing and Urban Development by consolidating the functions of the Housing and Urban Development Coordinating Council (HUDCC) and the Housing and Land Regulatory Board (HLURB), which shall act as the primary national government entity responsible for the management of housing and urban development.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
